3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with clear wall thickness and volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout fidelity; stairway, bathroom, and kitchen placement are highly accurate to 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture accurately reflects the 2D symbols in both type and placement.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials and lighting facilitate easy reading of the floor plan.

detected_errors.description: The external entrance door geometry is simplified as a wall opening without a door swing/leaf shown.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity and accurately translates all room configurations and furniture from the 2D source.
